g:HTMLPanel.h1: Ranking your music has never been easier

g:HTMLPanel.p: Fave100 is a crowdsourcing web app that lets you view and contribute to ranked "Top 100" song lists.
Add picks to your personal list and the aggregate list will update in minutes!
Not only can you share and discover great music, you can play any Fave100 list for free.
Your personal Fave100 page is your own customized countdown, fully ranked and ready to share with the world.
And each pick asks for an optional Why-Line, a 90 character or less answer to the question: “Why is this one of your favourites?”
Follow friends, journalists, celebrities or anyone else whose musical taste piques your interest.
Building your list is a breeze, thanks to our robust database of over 9 million songs. You can search by artist or song title or both.
Also, you can add songs from other lists to your list with the click of a button.
Editing your list is easy and intuitive. Use arrows to move a pick up or down the list or simply click on a ranking number to quickly change its position.
To edit a Why-Line, simply click on it and enter your changes. Creating a ranked music list has never been easier.
Click on any song, sit back and enjoy the sights and sounds. What’s more, the entire list where that song appears will play continuously.
You can also see featured Why-Lines as well as others who have that song in their list. There is simply no end to the amount of music discovery you can enjoy at Fave100!
So, what are you waiting for? Get your list on today!
